children.label: Primary color
children.name: primary
children.inline_help_text: Primary Brand color, Primary button color, Primary Icon color, Border color and hover background for Secondary2-3 buttons

children.name: secondary1
children.inline_help_text: Secondary 1 Brand color, Secondary 1 button color, Secondary Icon color

children.label: Secondary color 2

children.label: Secondary color 3
children.name: secondary3

children.label: Link color
children.name: link
children.inline_help_text: Link color, Heading link color

children.label: Focus color
children.name: focus
children.inline_help_text: Focus color for links, buttons, inputs, etc.  It is generally triggered when the user clicks or taps on an element or selects it with the keyboard's Tab key.

children.label: Accent color
children.name: accent
children.inline_help_text: Specify the accent color for user-interface controls such as bullet points, F.A.Q. arrows, radio, checkboxes. Browser default color if not specified.

children.label: Background
children.name: background
children.inline_help_text: Main background color

children.label: Font
children.name: font
children.inline_help_text: If no font is selected, the system font will be used
children.help_text: Instead of (slowly) downloading external fonts that sometimes don’t take advantage of newer, high DPI screens or dynamic font rendering, just skip this option and we will serve the best system font possible based on your operating system or device.
